channel.title: About on Monica Blog
channel.description: Recent content in About on Monica Blog

item.title: About my blog
item.description: I’m from La Paz, Bolivia. Traveler and I enjoy to learn about different languages, cities, cultures, places, music. I enjoy learning about DevOps culture: Do you want to learn more about this culture of work?, then I’ll be posting different articles in spanish and english, about new requirements, technologies, tools. I did this blog using Hugo, and it’s very funny to learn different programming languages and use them. Learn more and contribute on my projects my GitHub.
